dict.acceptation: 仪器；手段，工具；乐器；法律文件；
用仪器装备；为演奏谱曲；向…提交文书；

sent.orig: A signal analysis instrument and stress analysis instrument were developed based on the virtual instrument.
sent.trans: 结合一个虚拟信号分析仪的设计开发，介绍了仪器的总体结构和功能。

sent.orig: Produce optical products, for example camera, sun glass, chemical instrument, injector, analytical instrument and plastic products.
sent.trans: 生产光学产品，如照相机，太阳眼镜，化学仪器，注射器，分析仪及塑胶制品等。

sent.orig: This recording instrument is the moving coil instrument.
sent.trans: 本记录仪是磁电式仪表。

sent.orig: Remove the instrument panel top paRefer to Instrument Panel Top Pad Panel Systems for the procedures.
sent.trans: 拆去仪器面板顶垫。请参见8E单元的仪器面板顶垫程序仪器面板系统。

sent.orig: The instrument being made by the workers is a new type of measuring instrument.
sent.trans: 工人们正在制造的这台仪器是一台新型的测量仪。
